com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput

Interface SecurePinpadListener

  • Deprecated. 
    Will be removed future major release, the replacement interface is SecurePinpadListenerV2

    @Deprecated
public interface SecurePinpadListener
    An interface that is supposed to get the callback from the keypad

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFinish(PinAuthInput firstPin, PinAuthInput secondPin)
      Deprecated. 
      Will be removed future major release.

    • Method Detail

      • onFinish

        @Deprecated
void onFinish(PinAuthInput firstPin,
                          PinAuthInput secondPin)
        Deprecated. Will be removed future major release.
        This method is used to get the callback from keypad when user finished entering the pin(s) and pressing the OK button in the end. Please be noted that pin is presented as a secure data object, and the clear text password is not able to be extract from this secure data object.
        Parameters:
        firstPin - is PinAuthInput object that created from the first input data
        secondPin - is PinAuthInput object that created from the second input data. The secondPin will return null if isDoublePassword (as one of the parameters of the method createKeypad) is set as false.
        See Also:
        SecurePinpadListenerV2
